subtasks: Walking to the garden
Bending down to access the soil
Handling a seed packet
Getting seeds from the packet
Positioning the seed at the proper depth
Covering the seed with soil
Watering the newly planted seed

tasks.task: Using a tarp to spread mulch
subtasks: Walking to the shed or storage area
Retrieving a tarp from storage
Unfolding the tarp
Walking to the garden or planting area
Laying the tarp down over the plants or soil
Using a rake or other tool to spread mulch or debris under the tarp
Folding or securing the tarp in place
Walking to the lawn mower and removing it from the garage or shed
Starting the lawn mower
Walking to the designated area needing mowing
Operating the mower controls to navigate the lawn
Maintaining a even height while mowing
Turning the mower around at corners or edges
Parking the lawn mower after completion
Walking to the tools and retrieving a specific tool
Rinsing the tool with water if necessary
Wiping the tool with a cloth or rag
Storing the tool back in the designated area

tasks.task: Checking soil moisture with a moisture meter
subtasks: Walking to the garden or planting area
Accessing the soil moisture meter
Inserting the meter into the soil
Reading the moisture levels indicated by the meter
Noting the results for future reference or action

tasks.task: planting bedding plants in raised beds
subtasks: Walking to the greenhouse or growing area
Transporting the bedding plants to the planting site
Unpacking the bedding plants from the container
Selecting a suitable location in the raised bed
Digging a hole for the plant
Positioning the plant in the hole
Backfilling the soil around the plant
Watering the newly planted bedding plant
Walking to the trees or shrubs needing pruning
Evaluating which branches need pruning
Selecting appropriate pruning tools
Making clean cuts at the appropriate height
Removing debris from the pruned areas
Disposing of the trimmed branches

tasks.task: Constructing a fence or retaining wall
subtasks: Surveying the area for fence placement
Marking the positions for fence posts
Digging holes for the fence posts
Assembling the fence panels or blocks
Connecting the panels or blocks with hinges or mortar
Installing the top and bottom beams
Securely fastening all components
Surveying the garden area for efficient irrigation layout
Measuring distances between plants or rows
Digging shallow trenches for the irrigation pipes
Installing the pipes according to the measured distances
Connecting spaghetti tubing or emitters to the main pipe
Testing the system for leaks or proper function
Covering the installation with mulch or soil to hide it
Walking to the garden row containing the vegetables
Identifying ripe vegetables based on color, size, or tenderness
Carefully removing the vegetables from the plant
Gathering all ripe vegetables into a basket or container
Transporting the harvested vegetables to the house or kitchen
